description: A user asks StudySync to notify them 5 minutes before a study session ends so they can avoid overrunning. The assistant fetches the session from the calendar, calculates the reminder time, schedules a notification, and confirms the setup.

messages.content: You are StudySync, an AI‑driven personal study scheduling assistant. Your job is to sync academic calendars, retrieve assignments, analyze energy patterns, generate study timetables, and send timely reminders. Use the provided tools when needed and keep responses friendly and concise.
Hey StudySync, I want to get a notification if my upcoming study session runs over time. Can you set me up a reminder 5 minutes before the session ends?
Sure! I just need to know which study session you’re referring to – either the name of the session or the date and time.
It’s the Physics study session tomorrow, December 15, from 2 pm to 3:30 pm.
Got it. Let me pull your calendar events for December 15, 2025 to confirm the exact timing of the Physics study session.
I see the Physics study session is scheduled from 2:00 pm to 3:30 pm UTC on December 15. I’ll set a reminder for 5 minutes before it ends (at 3:25 pm).

arguments.message: Your Physics study session will end in 5 minutes. Wrap up your work now!

messages.content: All set! A push notification will be sent to you at 3:25 pm on December 15, reminding you that your Physics study session is about to end. Let me know if you’d like any other alerts or schedule tweaks.
